```{r setup, include=T}
####PACKAGE STORAGE
library(quanteda)
library(tm)
library(dplyr)
library(NMF)
library(udpipe)
library(syuzhet)
library(stringr)
library(flextable)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)

df_trt <- readRDS("data.rds")

df_trt%>%group_by(screen_name)%>%count(user_id)%>%arrange(desc(n))

foo <- table(df_trt$Marque)
foo<-as.data.frame(foo)
names(foo)<- c("Marque","Somme")
foo <- foo%>%arrange(desc(Somme))
flextable(foo)

```
